Synopsis:
---------
Jim Grant ( Robert Redford ), a former radical activist, now lives anonymously with her daughter around Albany, New York. But his quiet life takes a turn when Ben Shepard (Shia LaBeouf) , a young journalist , reveals her whereabouts to the FBI , who had three decades looking for him for his involvement in the bank robbery . Political thriller based on the novel by Neil Gordon.
